sourcesContent: "use strict";var _interopRequireDefault=require("@babel/runtime/helpers/interopRequireDefault");exports.__esModule=true;exports.default=exports.prefixExponent=void 0;var _formatDecimal=_interopRequireDefault(require("./format-decimal"));var prefixExponent;exports.prefixExponent=prefixExponent;var formatPrefixAuto=function formatPrefixAuto(x,p){var d=(0,_formatDecimal.default)(x,p);var coefficient,exponent,i,n;if(!d)return x+"";coefficient=d[0];exponent=d[1];i=exponent-(exports.prefixExponent=prefixExponent=Math.max(-8,Math.min(8,Math.floor(exponent/3)))*3)+1;n=coefficient.length;if(i===n){return coefficient}else if(i>n){return coefficient+new Array(i-n+1).join("0")}else if(i>0){return coefficient.slice(0,i)+"."+coefficient.slice(i)}return"0."+new Array(1-i).join("0")+(0,_formatDecimal.default)(x,Math.max(0,p+i-1))[0]};var _default=formatPrefixAuto;exports.default=_default;
